mdq:check.name: Entity Format Present
mdq:check.description: Check that each entity has a format specified.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import metadig.variable as mvar
# An entity format is not present if 'entityFormat' not in globals() or entityFormat is None: output = "An entity format was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
format = mvar.toUnicode(entityFormat)
if (mvar.isBlank(format)): output = "The entity format is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if the entity format is a single string if(isinstance(format, unicode)): output = u"The entity format '{}' was found.".format(format) elif (isinstance(format, list)): output = u"The entity format '{}' was found (first of {} formats.".format(format[0].strip(), len(format)) else: output = u"The entity format '{}' was found.".format(format) status = "SUCCESS" return True
